text: A taruvata cala mandi pravaktalanu memu vari taruvata pampamu. Mariyu maryam kumarudu isanu kuda pampamu mariyu ataniki injil nu prasadincamu. Mariyu atanini anusarincevari hrdayalalo memu jalini, karunanu kaligincamu, kani san'yasanni vare svayanga kalpincukunnaru. Memu danini varipai vidhincaledu, kani allah prasannatanu pondagori vare danini vidhincukunnaru, kani varu danini patincavalasina vidhanga nijayitito patincaledu. Kavuna varilo visvasincina variki vari pratiphalanni prasadincamu. Kani varilo cala mandi avidheyulu (phasikhun) unnaru
